message:
Hello everybody,

anybody integrated Google reCAPTCHA2 within a modal box and made it work with:

- WIndows7
- IE (10 || 11) ?

Notes:
- Working fine with any other OS/browser.
- Windows 10 + IE (10 || 11) => Works fine...
- Non modal => working with all combinations..
- I use $.magnificPopup() modal box, not bootstrap one.

- Came across this but didn't help
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/27886618/problems-with-new-google-recaptcha-in-ie-when-inside-modal-or-dialog/28965638#28965638
